item.title: By: Dave

item.description: Doing a little debugging search and came across this from one Ryan Stille. Imagine that...
item.content:encoded: Doing a little debugging search and came across this from one Ryan Stille. Imagine that…

item.title: By: iDayDream
item.dc:creator: iDayDream
item.description: Great, great find. I like to use cfdump in emails and have found that those emails have begun to get quite large due to so much HTML. This will be infinitely better.
item.content:encoded: Great, great find. I like to use cfdump in emails and have found that those emails have begun to get quite large due to so much HTML. This will be infinitely better.
